name: daisy do dishcloth
notes:
work in the round with simple color changes, to create this delightful crochet daisy dishcloth. featuring our 100% cotton lily sugar’n cream, the pattern boasts simple single and double crochet stitchwork. use traditional daisy shades for a cottage core pick-me-up, or choose your shades from a wonderful variety available in this yarn. it's a cute addition to any kitchen.

materials
lily® sugar’n cream® (2.5 oz/71 g; 120 yds/109 m)
contrast a country yellow (01612) 1 ball or 26 yds/24 m
contrast b ecru (00004) 1 ball or 23 yds/21 m

measurement
approx 9" [23 cm] diameter.
